verses.verse: (A Maskil of Asaph.) <S%H238>Listen,<s%> O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> to my <S%H8451>instruction;<s%> <S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in a <S%H4912>parable;<s%> I will <S%H5042>utter<s%> <S%H2420>dark<s%> <S%H2420>sayings<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%>
<S%H834>Which<s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> and <S%H3045>known,<s%> And our fathers have <S%H1>told<s%> us.

We will not <S%H3582>conceal<s%> them from their <S%H1121>children,<s%> But <S%H5608>tell<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And His <S%H5807>strength<s%> and His <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> <S%H6381>works<s%> that He has <S%H6213>done.<s%>

For He <S%H6965>established<s%> a <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a <S%H8451>law<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> our fathers, That they should <S%H1>teach<s%> them to their <S%H3045>children,<s%>

That the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> might <S%H3045>know,<s%> [even] the <S%H1121>children<s%> [yet] to be <S%H3205>born,<s%> [That] they may <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5608>tell<s%> [them] to their <S%H1121>children,<s%>

That they should <S%H7760>put<s%> their <S%H3689>confidence<s%> in <S%H430>God,<s%> And not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H4611>works<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> But <S%H5341>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

And not be like their fathers, A <S%H1>stubborn<s%> and <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H4784>generation,<s%> A <S%H1755>generation<s%> that did not <S%H1755>prepare<s%> its <S%H3559>heart,<s%> And whose <S%H3820>spirit<s%> was not <S%H7307>faithful<s%> to <S%H539>God.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were <S%H9556>archers<s%> <S%H9349>equipped<s%> with <S%H7198>bows,<s%> [Yet] they <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H2015>back<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle.<s%>
They did not <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> And <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H8451>law;<s%>
And they <S%H7911>forgot<s%> His <S%H5949>deeds,<s%> And His <S%H6381>miracles<s%> that He had <S%H7200>shown<s%> them.
He <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> their fathers, In the <S%H1>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H4714>field<s%> of <S%H7704>Zoan.<s%>

He <S%H1234>divided<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and caused them to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through;<s%> And He made the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5324>stand<s%> up <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H5067>heap.<s%>
Then He <S%H5148>led<s%> them with the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> with a <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
He <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> And <S%H8248>gave<s%> [them] <S%H7227>abundant<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> like the <S%H8415>ocean<s%> <S%H8415>depths.<s%>
He <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5140>streams<s%> also from the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> And caused <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H3381>run<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
Yet they <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H3254>continued<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%> against Him, To <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> in the <S%H6723>desert.<s%>
And in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> they <S%H5254>put<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> to the <S%H5254>test<s%> By <S%H7592>asking<s%> <S%H3978>food<s%> according to their <S%H5315>desire.<s%>
Then they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H430>God;<s%> They <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3201>"Can<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>?

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> He <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> so that <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H2100>gushed<s%> out, And <S%H5158>streams<s%> were <S%H7857>overflowing;<s%> <S%H3201>Can<s%> He <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%>? Will He <S%H3559>provide<s%> <S%H7607>meat<s%> for His <S%H5971>people<s%>?"

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> and was <S%H9378>full<s%> of <S%H9378>wrath,<s%> And a <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H9610>kindled<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5927>mounted<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> they did not <S%H539>believe<s%> in <S%H430>God,<s%> And did not <S%H982>trust<s%> in His <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Yet He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> And <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%>
And He <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H4305>down<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> upon them to <S%H398>eat,<s%> And <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1715>food<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
<S%H376>Man<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H47>angels;<s%> He <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H6720>food<s%> in <S%H7648>abundance.<s%>
He caused the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6921>wind<s%> to <S%H5265>blow<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> And by His <S%H5797>power<s%> He <S%H5090>directed<s%> the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H8486>wind.<s%>
When He <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H7607>meat<s%> upon them like the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> Even <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> like the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%>
Then He let [them] <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of their <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H5439>Round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> their <S%H4908>dwellings.<s%>
So they <S%H398>ate<s%> and were <S%H3966>well<s%> <S%H7646>filled;<s%> And their <S%H8378>desire<s%> He <S%H935>gave<s%> to them.
Before they had <S%H2114>satisfied<s%> their <S%H8378>desire,<s%> <S%H5750>While<s%> their <S%H400>food<s%> was in their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%>

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>rose<s%> against them, And <S%H2026>killed<s%> some of their <S%H9304>stoutest<s%> ones, And <S%H3766>subdued<s%> the <S%H970>choice<s%> <S%H977>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
In spite of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> they <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> And did not <S%H539>believe<s%> in His <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H6381>works.<s%>
So He <S%H3615>brought<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> to an <S%H3615>end<s%> in <S%H1892>futility,<s%> And their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H928>sudden<s%> <S%H928>terror.<s%>
<S%H518>When<s%> He <S%H2026>killed<s%> them, then they <S%H1875>sought<s%> Him, And <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H7836>searched<s%> <S%H7836>diligently<s%> for <S%H410>God;<s%>
And they <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> was their <S%H6697>rock,<s%> And the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> their <S%H1350>Redeemer.<s%>
But they <S%H6601>deceived<s%> Him with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And <S%H3576>lied<s%> to Him with their <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
For their <S%H3820>heart<s%> was not <S%H3559>steadfast<s%> <S%H5973>toward<s%> Him, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> were they <S%H539>faithful<s%> in His <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

But He, being <S%H7349>compassionate,<s%> <S%H3722>forgave<s%> [their] <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and did not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> [them]; And <S%H7235>often<s%> He <S%H7725>restrained<s%> His <S%H639>anger,<s%> And did not <S%H5782>arouse<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>
Thus He <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that they were but <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> A <S%H7307>wind<s%> that <S%H1980>passes<s%> and does not <S%H7725>return.<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H4100>often<s%> they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against Him in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> And <S%H6087>grieved<s%> Him in the <S%H3452>desert!<s%>
And <S%H7725>again<s%> and again they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> And <S%H8428>pained<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
They did not <S%H2142>remember<s%> His <S%H3027>power,<s%> The <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> He <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> them from the <S%H6862>adversary,<s%>
<S%H834>When<s%> He <S%H7760>performed<s%> His <S%H226>signs<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And His <S%H4159>marvels<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan,<s%>
And <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H2975>rivers<s%> to <S%H1818>blood,<s%> And their <S%H5140>streams,<s%> they could not <S%H8354>drink.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> among them <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of <S%H6157>flies,<s%> which <S%H398>devoured<s%> them, And <S%H6854>frogs<s%> which <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> them.
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> also their <S%H2981>crops<s%> to the <S%H2625>grasshopper,<s%> And the <S%H3018>product<s%> of their <S%H3018>labor<s%> to the <S%H697>locust.<s%>
He <S%H2026>destroyed<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> with <S%H1259>hailstones,<s%> And their <S%H8256>sycamore<s%> <S%H8256>trees<s%> with <S%H2602>frost.<s%>
He <S%H5462>gave<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> their <S%H1165>cattle<s%> also to the <S%H1259>hailstones,<s%> And their <S%H4735>herds<s%> to <S%H7565>bolts<s%> of <S%H7565>lightning.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> upon them His <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H5678>Fury,<s%> and <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> and <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> A <S%H4917>band<s%> of <S%H7451>destroying<s%> <S%H4397>angels.<s%>

He <S%H6424>leveled<s%> a <S%H5410>path<s%> for His <S%H639>anger;<s%> He did not <S%H2820>spare<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death,<s%> But <S%H5462>gave<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> their <S%H9130>life<s%> to the <S%H1698>plague,<s%>
And <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7225>first-born<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> The first [issue] of their <S%H202>virility<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>
But He <S%H5265>led<s%> <S%H5265>forth<s%> His own <S%H5971>people<s%> like <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> And <S%H5090>guided<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like a <S%H5739>flock;<s%>
And He <S%H5148>led<s%> them <S%H983>safely,<s%> so that they did not <S%H6342>fear;<s%> But the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3680>engulfed<s%> their <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

So He <S%H935>brought<s%> them to His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1366>land,<s%> To <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> which His <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> had <S%H7069>gained.<s%>

He also <S%H1644>drove<s%> out the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, And He <S%H5307>apportioned<s%> them for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> by <S%H9112>measurement,<s%> And made the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>
Yet they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> and <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> And did not <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H9381>testimonies,<s%>

But <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H5472>back<s%> and <S%H898>acted<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> like their fathers; They <S%H1>turned<s%> <S%H2015>aside<s%> like a <S%H2015>treacherous<s%> <S%H7423>bow.<s%>
For they <S%H3707>provoked<s%> Him with their <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places,<s%> And aroused His <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with their <S%H6456>graven<s%> <S%H6456>images.<s%>
When <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard,<s%> He was <S%H9378>filled<s%> with <S%H9378>wrath,<s%> And <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3988>abhorred<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>
So that He <S%H5203>abandoned<s%> the <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>place<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> The <S%H168>tent<s%> which He had <S%H7931>pitched<s%> among <S%H120>men,<s%>
And <S%H5414>gave<s%> up His <S%H5797>strength<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> And His <S%H8597>glory<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6862>adversary.<s%>
He also <S%H5462>delivered<s%> His <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> And was <S%H9378>filled<s%> with <S%H9378>wrath<s%> at His <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
<S%H784>Fire<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> His <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men;<s%> And His <S%H1330>virgins<s%> had <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1984>wedding<s%> <S%H1984>songs.<s%>
His <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> And His <S%H490>widows<s%> could not <S%H1058>weep.<s%>
Then the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%> as [if from] <S%H3463>sleep,<s%> Like a <S%H1368>warrior<s%> <S%H9548>overcome<s%> by <S%H3196>wine.<s%>
And He <S%H5221>drove<s%> His <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H268>backward;<s%> He <S%H5414>put<s%> on them an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
He also <S%H3988>rejected<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> And did not <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%>
But <S%H977>chose<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H157>loved.<s%>
And He <S%H1129>built<s%> His <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> the <S%H7311>heights,<s%> Like the <S%H776>earth<s%> which He has <S%H3245>founded<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
He also <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> His <S%H5650>servant,<s%> And <S%H3947>took<s%> him from the <S%H6629>sheepfolds<s%><S%H4356>;<s%>

From the <S%H310>care<s%> of the <S%H5763>ewes<s%> with <S%H5763>suckling<s%> <S%H5763>lambs<s%> He <S%H935>brought<s%> him, To <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> His <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
So he <S%H7462>shepherded<s%> them according to the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> And <S%H5148>guided<s%> them with his <S%H8394>skillful<s%> <S%H3709>hands.<s%>
